articles.author: Kevin Dotson, CNN
articles.title: Kentucky Derby winner Rich Strike won't run the Preakness Stakes - CNN
articles.description: Fresh off his victory at the 148th Kentucky Derby, Rich Strike will not race at the upcoming Preakness Stakes -- the second leg of the horse racing's triple crown, the horse's owner Rick Dawson said in a statement Thursday.
